EmailTemplate.name: ENG-OpenStack-Nurture.ENG-OpenStack-Early-02.02-OpenStack-Adoption-Blog
EmailTemplate.subject: Is OpenStack Adoption Reaching A Tipping Point?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/openstack-journey-to-open-source-adoption/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Throughout 2015 the adoption of OpenStack has been nothing short of incredible. Major players such as Walmart and PayPal made the jump into open source this past year and the buzz has only been growing since then. But what does this buzz all mean? Click below and join Eric Wright as he dives into this wave of adoption and what the future looks like for OpenStack. <[[http://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/openstack-journey-to-open-source-adoption/]]> - The Turbonomic Team
